name: LN_ATTACH_DCN
description:
This table holds the document control numbers (DCNs) assigned to the attachments. 





The LN_ATTACH_TYP, LN_ATTACH_CD, and LN_ATTACH_DCN tables are related to one another.  The number of lines in these tables will always be the same and values on the same line in each table will correspond to one another.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this contact.

columns.name: LN_ATTACH_DCN
columns.description: This item holds the document control number (DCN) for each attachment.
